thag6.3:5.3: falls away from the true teaching,
thag6.3:5.4: like a fish in too little water.
thag6.3:6.3: doesn’t thrive in the true teaching,
thag6.3:6.4: like a rotten seed in a field.
thag6.3:7.4: in the teaching of the Dhamma king.
thag6.3:8.3: doesn’t fall away from the true teaching,
thag6.3:8.4: like a fish in plenty of water.
thag6.3:9.4: like a quality seed in a field.
thag6.3:10.4: in the teaching of the Dhamma king.
